personal_traits.name: A Good Day to Die
personal_traits.desc: You are always willing to go down fighting with your ship. Go Down Fighting may be activated at any Hull integrity. Its scaling benefits will function as though your Hull is at 50% Hull Integrity, at most.

personal_traits.name: Ablative Shell
personal_traits.desc: Taking inspiration from insects, you have installed a special system of shield generators that are able to shed damaged outer defensive layers in order to rapidly replace them with stronger, healthier defenses.

personal_traits.name: Absolute Candor
personal_traits.desc:
When controlled, remove Control effects (20 sec recharge)
+100% Exploit Damage

personal_traits.name: Abundance of Caution
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. You are just paranoid enough to protect yourself from surprise engagements, whether they be from confused allies unable to tell friend from foe, or from sudden ambushes of decloaking or suprise enemies that initiate combat while already in close proximity.

personal_traits.name: Accept No Sacrifice
personal_traits.desc: +25% Healing on Targets below half Health.

personal_traits.name: Accurate
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves the accuracy of space weapons.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Active Armor Hardening
personal_traits.desc: Provides scaling damage resistance rating as health decreases in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Active Hull Hardening
personal_traits.desc: Provides scaling damage resistance rating as health decreases in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Active Rerouting
personal_traits.desc: Shield Heal from Kit Abilities

personal_traits.name: Acute Senses
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Makes it significantly easier to detect stealthed opponents and increases your exploit damage by 10%.  Some attacks can perform an Exploit for bonus damage if the target is Exposed.  This trait increases the damage done by a successful Exploit.  This trait also decreases the bonus damage you take when enemies attack you with Flanking bonuses.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Benzite, Ferengi, Gorn, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Orion, Pakled, Romulan, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Adaptive Defense (ground)
personal_traits.desc: Gain 40 Damage Resistance Rating divided by number of enemies targeting you

personal_traits.name: Adaptive Defense (space)
personal_traits.desc: Gain 40 Damage Resistance Rating divided by number of enemies targeting you

personal_traits.name: Adaptive Offense (ground)
personal_traits.desc:
Gain 2.7% Critical Chance
On Critically Striking, 0.9% Critical Chance becomes 3% Critical Severity for 10 sec
Max 9% Critical Severity

personal_traits.name: Adaptive Offense (space)
personal_traits.desc:
Gain 2.7% Critical Chance
On Critically Striking, 0.9% Critical Chance becomes 3% Critical Severity for 10 sec
Max 9% Critical Severity

personal_traits.name: Adrenal Release
personal_traits.desc: You are able to enter a berserker rage at will, drastically increasing your ability to deal damage. However, you also take more damage from all sources while in this state.

personal_traits.name: Advanced Engines
personal_traits.desc: Increases ships Flight Speed & Turn Rate

personal_traits.name: Advanced Hull Reinforcement
personal_traits.desc: Provides minor damage resistance in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Advanced Rapid Support
personal_traits.desc: Your Career-specific Fleet ability has a reduced Recharge Time. This applies to Engineering Fleet, Tactical Fleet, and Science Fleet.

personal_traits.name: Advanced Targeting Systems
personal_traits.desc: Slightly increases critical severity in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Against All Odds
personal_traits.desc: Increased Hull Healing on targets who are on low Hull.

personal_traits.name: Aggressive
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves the damage you deal and makes enemies more likely to attack you over other targets.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Ferasan, Gorn, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Human, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Saurian

personal_traits.name: Agony Modulator
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Your kit powers that Confuse, Disable, Hold, Placate, or Root the target, or reduce Run Speed, also cause damage over time to the target.

personal_traits.name: Airiam's Augments
personal_traits.desc: +Damage Over Time and Area of Effect Resistance

personal_traits.name: Airiam's Efficiency
personal_traits.desc: Damage Over Time and Area of Effect Resistance

personal_traits.name: Anchored
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. If your starship remains stationary for any reason, you will begin gaining bonuses to your outgoing damage, while your passive resistances to incoming damage suffer a small penalty. As soon as you are mobile again, both the bonus and penalty will be lost.

personal_traits.name: Anti-Time Entanglement Singularity
personal_traits.desc: Shrinking AoE Damage Hazard, Slows and Holds Foes

personal_traits.name: Armor Penetration
personal_traits.desc: Ground weapons have increased Armor Penetration

personal_traits.name: Assault Drone Fabrication
personal_traits.desc: Support Drones are fabricated with additional combat subroutines, giving them a Wide Beam secondary fire.

personal_traits.name: Assault Training
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Increases Damage from Assault Weapons.

personal_traits.name: Astrophysicist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves your Starship Particle Generators, Flow Capacitors, and Sensors stats, which enhance ship's Exotic Particle Damage, Energy Drains and Stealth Detection, as well as your Confuse and Placate resistance.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Automated Protomatter Conduits
personal_traits.desc: Gain Hull and Shield Regeneration when critically hit

personal_traits.name: Automated Rerouting
personal_traits.desc: Chance to receive a Shield Heal when activating any Bridge Officer ability.

personal_traits.name: Auxiliary Power Configuration - Defense
personal_traits.desc: In space combat you gain a bonus to Maximum Hull HP, Maximum Shield HP, Kinetic Damage Resistance Rating and Energy Damage Resistance Rating that scales based on your Auxiliary Power Level.

personal_traits.name: Auxiliary Power Configuration - Offense
personal_traits.desc: In space combat you gain a damage and accuracy boost based on your Auxiliary Power Level.

personal_traits.name: Barter By Combat
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. While this trait is slotted, any time you defeat a foe there is a chance of having additional rewards granted directly into your inventory.

personal_traits.name: Beam Barrage
personal_traits.desc: Gain Beam Damage when activating Beam skills

personal_traits.name: Beam Training
personal_traits.desc: Increases Damage from your Beam weapons

personal_traits.name: Berserker
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Scaling Damage Increase.

personal_traits.name: Bio-Molecular Shield Generator
personal_traits.desc: Bio-Molecular Shield Generator creates a fixed position shield generator, in space combat, that regenerates starship shields and reduces the damage taken by starship shields for allies in the immediate area.

personal_traits.name: Biotech Patch
personal_traits.desc: Improves the effectiveness of all your abilities which restore Hull.

personal_traits.name: Bite
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Deals moderate melee damage and poisons the target. This attack can Exploit the target.

personal_traits.name: Blaze of Glory
personal_traits.desc: Short Duration Rez on Death

personal_traits.name: Blissful Agony
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: You gain a bonus to Control and Damage Resistance and a Heal over Time effect for ten seconds when you are the target of a Control effect. May occur once every 30 seconds.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Blue Skies
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Starting at 75% Hull, you will gain increasing bonuses to Flight Speed, Turn Rate, and Defense Rating as your Hull continues to fall lower and lower.  This bonus is recalculated every 0.5 sec.

personal_traits.name: Bombardier
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. It takes a special kind of mind to intuit how best to control the explosions of spatial charges, grenades and percussive anomalies. That mind lives on in you, even the most chaotic forces dance to your tune.

personal_traits.name: Bond With Life
personal_traits.desc:
Used on Self: Manage animals
Used on valid animal: Create Bond if animal is low Health
Used on other Foe: Deploy active animal for 80 sec

personal_traits.name: Borg Nanites
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Regenerates shields every few seconds, and decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration.

personal_traits.name: Brawler
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait:  You gain additional bonuses by engaging opponents in Melee combat.

personal_traits.name: Bulkhead Technician
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases your Maximum Hull Hit Points.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Cannon Training
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases Damage from your Cannon weapons.

personal_traits.name: Choose to Live
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Issue an ultimatum to your chosen foe: Either they will be unwilling to fight you, or  they will suffer a severe debuff against resisting Melee Attacks. It is their choice.

personal_traits.name: Chrono-Capacitor Array
personal_traits.desc: Reduces Bridge Officer Recharge Times

personal_traits.name: Circulatory Redundancies
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of toxins and fires.

personal_traits.name: Close Quarters Combatant
personal_traits.desc: Melee Damage and Run Speed

personal_traits.name: Coalition Squad Tactics
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: You gain situational bonuses, depending upon the compilation of your team. For each Player on your team, you will gain a different personal bonus depending upon their profession (Engineer, Science, or Tactical).

personal_traits.name: Coalition Starship Tactics
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait:  You gain situational bonuses, depending upon the composition of your team. For each Player on your team including yourself, you will gain a different personal bonus depending upon their profession (Engineer, Science, or Tactical).

personal_traits.name: Cold Blooded
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to fire damage and some resistance to plasma fire damage over time effects.

personal_traits.name: Cold Dwelling
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides moderate resistance to movement debuffs, that is, anything that slows or stops your run speed.

personal_traits.name: Combat Awareness
personal_traits.desc: Damage against Controlled targets

personal_traits.name: Combined Assault
personal_traits.desc: You quickly designate targets for your away team to focus fire. Your Fire on my Mark's recharge time is reduced if the target dies while it is still active.

personal_traits.name: Concussive Tachyon Emission
personal_traits.desc: AOE Heavy Shields Drain

personal_traits.name: Conduit
personal_traits.desc:
You gain extra benefit from using all forms of Shield Charges and Power Cells. When using a Shield Charge, you will trigger an extra amount of Shield Healing. When using a Power Cell, you will trigger an extra Damage Bonus to energy weapons.
  • +10% All Energy Damage (*Power Cells Only)
  • Additional Shield Heal (*Shield Charges only)

personal_traits.name: Conservation of Energy
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. This trait causes all energy weapon attacks against you to have a chance of increasing your Exotic Damage.  This damage increase stacks up to three times.  Exotic Damage powers are powers whose damage increases with the Starship Particle Generators skill.

personal_traits.name: Consulting the Team
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. When the Captain's Health falls below 50%, recover half the recharge time of all Team Kit Modules and Bridge Officer Abilities. 120 second recharge.

personal_traits.name: Controlled Countermeasures
personal_traits.desc: Damage against Controlled targets

personal_traits.name: Coordinated Targeting Solution
personal_traits.desc: You can quickly coordinate firing solutions on vulnerable ships. Your Fire on my Mark's recharge time is reduced if the target dies while it is still active.

personal_traits.name: Corrosive Blood
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of toxins. Whenever you are bitten, your corrosive blood inflicts toxic damage on the attacker.

personal_traits.name: Counter-Stroke
personal_traits.desc: When Controlled, gain Crit Severity

personal_traits.name: Covert
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases the effectiveness of your stealth abilities and increases your exploit damage.  Some attacks can perform an Exploit for bonus damage if the target is Exposed.  This trait increased the damage done by a successful Exploit.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Klingon, Lethean, Nausicaan, Pakled, Reman, Romulan, Saurian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Creative
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves effectiveness of Kit Module abilities.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Benzite, Bolian, Caitian, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Jem'Hadar Vanguard , Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Crippling Fire
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. This trait causes all of your critical hits with attacks to reduce your target's Accuracy by a moderate amount.  This effect stacks up to three times.

personal_traits.name: Critical Deflection
personal_traits.desc: Critical Hit Chance Debuff

personal_traits.name: Critical Feint
personal_traits.desc: Critical Hit Chance Debuff

personal_traits.name: Crucial Component Redistribution
personal_traits.desc: Improves your starship's resistance to control effects and improves your Antiproton Damage Resistance in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Cryo Immobilizer Module
personal_traits.desc: You have a chance to inflict cold damage over time and immobilize your target when you deliver a critical hit in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Cyclical Power Capacitors
personal_traits.desc: Drain Expertise after using Energy drain or Shield Drain Bridge Officer.

personal_traits.name: Deadly Aim
personal_traits.desc: Slightly increases critical severity in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Defiance
personal_traits.desc:
Defiance grants a massive damage resistance buff, a large damage buff and a healing over time effect for a short time.
This cannot be used unless your health is below 50%.

personal_traits.name: Deft Cannoneer
personal_traits.desc:
Gain Turn Rate and Inertia when activating Cannon skills
*Grants Deft Cannoneer

personal_traits.name: Delta Recruit
personal_traits.desc: Team Earns Dilithium Ore on Kill

personal_traits.name: Deploy Sensor Interference Platform
personal_traits.desc: Deploy Sensor Interference Platform - Taunt and Damage Debuff

personal_traits.name: Deprogrammed
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. First-hand experience with the Elachi-augmented indoctrination process used by the Tal Shiar provides you with minor innoculation to Elachi gas, and a slight insight into Elachi thought processes. You ignore the damage debuffing effects of Elachi gas clouds, and gain a 3% damage bonus against Elachi targets on the ground.

personal_traits.name: Destabilizing Phase Array
personal_traits.desc: Trigger Damage Immunity When Hit

personal_traits.name: Destabilizing Phase Screen
personal_traits.desc: Trigger Damage Immunity When Hit

personal_traits.name: Diburnium Impact Lattice
personal_traits.desc: Phaser Damage and Control Resistance

personal_traits.name: Diburnium Mesh
personal_traits.desc: Phaser Damage and Control Resistance

personal_traits.name: Disabling Strikes
personal_traits.desc: You will knock down your enemy when you land a critical hit in ground combat, as long as this effect is active. A successful critical hit will consume this effect temporarily, which will refresh 20 seconds later.

personal_traits.name: Distributed Shield Rerouting
personal_traits.desc: Distributed Shield Rerouting causes Reroute Power to Shields to apply a weaker shield heal to nearby allies when activated.

personal_traits.name: Drookmani Salvage Claim
personal_traits.desc: space Trait. While this trait is slotted, any time you defeat a foe there is a chance of having additional rewards granted directly into your inventory.

personal_traits.name: Duelist's Fervor
personal_traits.desc: 5% All Damage and 5 Accuracy Rating for 10 sec (Effect stack up to 3 times)

personal_traits.name: Dumb Luck
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases your vulnerability to mind controlling attacks, but makes you incredibly lucky.

personal_traits.name: Efficient Captain
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Provides a bonus to Warp Core Efficiency skill, improving all power levels (Weapon, Shield, Engine and Auxiliary) of your ship when your power is low. This bonus starts at +0 at 75 power, and scales up as your power setting is lowered.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Benzite, Bolian, Lethean, Jem'Hadar, Jem'Hadar Vanguard

personal_traits.name: Elusive
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Increases your ship's Defense value which reduces the chance for enemy ships to hit you with their weapons.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Emergency Fix
personal_traits.desc: When critically hit in ground combat you have a chance to apply Emergency Fix which causes you to regenerate health and gain shield damage resistance for a short time. The chance for this effect to trigger increases as your health decreases.

personal_traits.name: Emergency Personal Cloaking Device
personal_traits.desc: Cloak Self when at Low Health

personal_traits.name: Emergency Secondary Shielding
personal_traits.desc: You gain an instant heal to your shields when you are critically hit in space combat, as along as this effect is active. Being critically hit will consume the effect temporarily, which will refresh 20 sconds later.

personal_traits.name: Empathic
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Reduces the amount of attention you attract during battle and decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration for your team.

personal_traits.name: Empathic Adaptation
personal_traits.desc: Grants a chance to increase Shield Hardness by a small amount when hit in ground combat. This chance is doubled versus Psionic Damage. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

personal_traits.name: Empathic Reverberation
personal_traits.desc: Grants a chance to reflect Energy Damage when hit in ground combat. Chance is doubled versus Psionic Damage. This effect cannot be triggered more than once every 10 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Energized Nanites
personal_traits.desc: Heals Health when Dealing Damage.

personal_traits.name: Energy Refrequencer
personal_traits.desc: Heals Hull when Dealing Damage

personal_traits.name: Engineered Soldier
personal_traits.desc: Improves a range of offensive capabilities, including ranged weapon damage, critical hit chance, critical hit damage and melee damage.

personal_traits.name: Engineered Soldier (Space)
personal_traits.desc: Bonus Weapon damage, Critical Chance, and Critical Severity

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Armor Penetration
personal_traits.desc: Ship weapons have increased Armor Penetration

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Personal Shields
personal_traits.desc: Increases your shield health in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Rending Shots
personal_traits.desc: Weapon Non-Crits increase Crit Chance

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Sensors
personal_traits.desc: Control and Drain Strength from Captain Abilities

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Shield Penetration
personal_traits.desc: Your directed energy attacks ignore some of your target's shields in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Enhanced Shield Systems
personal_traits.desc: Increases your ship's shield health in space combat.

personal_traits.name: EPS Manifold Efficiency
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. When you use Emergency Power to Auxiliary, Emergency Power to Engines, Emergency Power to Shields, or Emergency Power to Weapons, this trait causes all of your other power levels to gain a moderate subsystem boost.  When you use any Battery, this trait causes all of your other power levels to gain a large subsystem boost.

personal_traits.name: EPS Overload
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. You carefully overload your EPS conduits, resulting in increased weapons performance. The exact nature of the improvement is based on which power level was highest at the time of activation.

personal_traits.name: Evasive Tactics
personal_traits.desc: Control Immunity

personal_traits.name: Exotic Absorption
personal_traits.desc: When struck by any Exotic Damage ability, gain 20% Shield Hardness and a minor Shield Regeneration for 10 seconds (max once per 60 seconds)

personal_traits.name: Expedient Repairs
personal_traits.desc:
Your repairs expertise allows you to briefly improve the performance of allied starships that you help to restore. Additionally, when restoring an ally other than yourself, all of your Hull and Shield Healing abilities will recharge more quickly.
  • To Healed Ally: Increased All Damage output and All Damage Resistance Rating
  • To Self: Reduce recharge timers on Shield and Hull Healing abilities.

personal_traits.name: Eyes of the Swarm
personal_traits.desc: Linked sensor grids provide extra data in real-time, allowing a carrier to gather additional battlefield information from their active hangar pets. Stacks up to 5 times max.

personal_traits.name: Failsafe Scrambler
personal_traits.desc: When your hull drops below 20%, automatically Placate all foes within 10km for 5 seconds and reset Threat vs. all nearby NPCs (max once per 90 seconds)

personal_traits.name: Feel the Weight of Our Presence
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Each friendly ship on the map debuffs the Damage Resistance Rating of Foes within 12km by 0.5 for 10sec, stacking up to 12.5 for 25 Allies.  Mines and Torpedos don't count, but Hangar Pets, Distress Beacons, Turrets, and all other forms of Allies do.  The sight of a ship can strike fear into the hearts of foes, but the people represented by that ship form its true strength.  A fleet, an alliance, or even just a cause, what matters most is the people it champions.  [Applies "Feel the Weight of our Presence": -0.5 All Damage Resistance Rating for 10 sec

personal_traits.name: Field Researcher
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. This trait improves your damage dealt to enemies affected by Control or Debuff powers.

personal_traits.name: Field Technician
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Reduces recharge time for Kit abilities.

personal_traits.name: Fire Ball Escape
personal_traits.desc: You ride the shockwave of a warp corp breach and harness some of its power. You are immune to one Warp Core Breach per 120 seconds, and being hit by one while immune in this way improves your Turn Rate, Flight Speed, Defense, and Critical Severity for a short time.

personal_traits.name: Fleet Coordinator
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases your Damage based on how many players are in your party. (Self Included)

personal_traits.name: Forced Challenge
personal_traits.desc: Forced challenge will tractor your target to you and deal shield damage to their forward shield facing. This is a challenge to your opponent that can not be denied.

personal_traits.name: Fortified Hull
personal_traits.desc: Increased Max Hull.

personal_traits.name: Fragment of AI Tech
personal_traits.desc:
Improves Control Expertise. Improves Energy Weapon Damage based on Control Expertise (maximum 30% at 300 Control Expertise)

Many of Control's ships were left behind after the battle, positively riddled with technology gained from its portion of the Sphere data. Despite Starfleet's best efforts, it proved impossible to keep all of these advances under wraps.
+__% Energy Weapon Damage based on Control Expertise (Max +30% at 300 Control Expertise)
+50 Control Expertise
(Improves Control Effects / Resistance to Same)

Skills that affect this ability:
Control Expertise
(Improves Control Effects / Resistance to Same)

personal_traits.name: Fresh From R&R
personal_traits.desc:
Team Bridge Officer Abilities' minimum cooldowns are 5 seconds faster.
Additionally, the first Control effect applied to the ship is cleansed and the ship gain 3 seconds of Control immunity thereafter. The cleanse effect has a 45 second recharge. Team abilities are: Engineering Team, Tactical Team, Science Team, Intel Team and Pilot Team.

The moral benefits of having a well-rested crew are no easier to quantify than they are to forgo.

personal_traits.name: Fulcrum Shift
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Flight Speed and Turn Rate Enhanced by Control Bridge Officer Abilities

personal_traits.name: Fury
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Gradually increases your damage once your health drops below half, making you deal more damage the closer you come to death.

personal_traits.name: Galvanized Munitions
personal_traits.desc: A percentage of Cannon and Turret damage heals your front shield facing.

personal_traits.name: Gamma Recruit
personal_traits.desc: Team Earns Salvage on Kill

personal_traits.name: Give Your All
personal_traits.desc: Gain Damage Reduction from Engineering abilities

personal_traits.name: Go Fast!
personal_traits.desc:
Space Trait: An advanced understanding of propulsion systems allows your ship to be faster at and more agile at Impulse speeds.

"On my mark. Ready? Go Fast!
-Dal R'El"

personal_traits.name: Grace Under Fire
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. If you take more than 20% of your hitpoints in damage within a 5 second period, the cooldown on Miraculous Repairs is reset. This trait will only trigger when Miraculous Repairs is already on cooldown, and can only trigger once every 90 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Hardened Sensors
personal_traits.desc: Control and Drain Resistance

personal_traits.name: Honorable
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases damage resistance and threat generation.

personal_traits.name: Hot Pursuit
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Mines become even deadlier under your expert handling, as you are able to double their effective target-finding range. This makes them far more likely to seek out enemy targets and deliver their payload.

personal_traits.name: Hull-Repairing Nanites
personal_traits.desc: Hull Regeneration

personal_traits.name: Hyper Metabolism
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration and provides innate resistance to the effects of radiation and toxins.

personal_traits.name: Identify Vulnerability
personal_traits.desc: Minor Shield Penetration

personal_traits.name: Imminent Danger
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Auto Dodge Increase at Low Health

personal_traits.name: Impact Defense Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases Resistance against Kinetic and Physical based attacks.

personal_traits.name: Imposing Presence
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Improves outgoing Hull Healing powers, and makes enemies more likely to attack you over other targets.

personal_traits.name: Improvised Boarding Party
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Boarding Party deals substantial Physical Damage Over Time, and provides a chance for Control Bridge Officer Abilities to trigger Boarding Party I on their targets.

personal_traits.name: Independent Wingmate
personal_traits.desc: The first Hangar Pet launched gains massive bonuses permanentely. If it is destroyed, the next launched Hangar Pet attains the bonuses instead, and so on.

personal_traits.name: Indomitable
personal_traits.desc: Increased Hit Points.

personal_traits.name: Inelastic Collisions
personal_traits.desc: Shield Resist when using Shield heals

personal_traits.name: Infiltrator
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Increases the effectiveness of cloaking abilities and provides a minor Defense boost.  Increases the duration of the damage buff the ship gains after decloaking.

personal_traits.name: Innocuous
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Slightly increases Critical Severity, and makes enemies less likely to attack you over other targets.

personal_traits.name: Integrated Nanofibers
personal_traits.desc: Provides minor damage resistance in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Intel Handler
personal_traits.desc: Your liaison in the intelligence services of your faction designates targets for you. Destroying these targets during the time window provides bonuses to Critical Chance for a moderate duration.

personal_traits.name: Intelligence Agent Attach
personal_traits.desc:
Weapon Critical Strikes partially recharge Captain Ability

Weapon Critical Strikes restore a small amount of Captain Ability recharge time. Cannot reduce an ability below its minimum recharge time. Maximum one reduction per 1.33 seconds.

Having an observer from intelligence can be taxing, but the advantage in access to information has tempted many Captains into such an arrangement
On Weapon Critical Strike, restore 2% of Captain Ability Recharge

personal_traits.name: Intense Focus
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. The longer you remain in combat, the more you are capable of penetrating your foes' defenses. Every several seconds, your accuracy and shield penetration will increase up to a maximum of 4 stack. All stacks of this buff will be lost when you leave Combat.

personal_traits.name: Intimidating Strikes
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Your knowledge of ship operations and crew psychological tendencies allows you to target your torpedoes at ship locations that are intended to strike fear into the target. Your torpedo hits have a chance to render Confused for a short duration.

personal_traits.name: Introspection
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: While you remain stationary, you gain a stacking bonus to Damage and Regeneration at a cost to Damage Resistance.

personal_traits.name: Invasive Control Programming
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: When you use certain Control powers on your target, also trigger random Subsystem Disable. May occur once every 30 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Invigorating Radiation
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: After receiving Radiation Damage,you heal overtime and remove all debuffs.

personal_traits.name: Ironsides
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. The longer you remain in combat, the more you are capable of withstanding enemy attacks. Every several seconds, your damage resistance rating and health regeneration will increase up to a maximum of 5 stacks. All stacks of this buff will be lost when you leave Combat.

personal_traits.name: Joined Symbiote
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. The memories of your symbiote improve your abilities in a wide range of starship roles. You receive bonus skill points in Energy Weapon Training, Projectile Weapon Training, Shield Restoration, Hull Restoration, Exotic Particle Generator, Control Expertise and Drain Expertise.

personal_traits.name: Kinetic Precision
personal_traits.desc: Bonus Shield Penetration for Projectiles

personal_traits.name: Klingon Recruit
personal_traits.desc: Earn Dilithium Ore on Kill

personal_traits.name: Landry's Loyalty
personal_traits.desc: Critical Hits Cleanse Debuffs

personal_traits.name: Landry's Tenacity
personal_traits.desc: Critical Hits Cleanse Debuffs

personal_traits.name: Last Ditch Effort
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Doubles the amount of damage resistance that your outgoing weapon attacks grant you while under the effects of Go Down Fighting.  This damage resistance increase stacks up to three times.

personal_traits.name: Lead Foot
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. A special understanding of high-power warp fields allows your ship to be faster and more nimble while Full Impulse and Quantum Slipstream are active.

personal_traits.name: Leadership
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Inspires your ship crew, leading to 30% faster damage and subsystem repair during combat, and 60% out of combat.

personal_traits.name: Lethality
personal_traits.desc: Increases your Critical Hit Chance in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Liberated Borg Kingdom Nanoprobes (ground)
personal_traits.desc: Whlie this trait is slotted, every 2 seconds spent in Combat will grant an increasing amount of Kinetic Damage Resistance Rating and Critical Severity with Weapons. This stacks up to 10 times. All stacks are lost when you exit combat.

personal_traits.name: Liberated Borg Kingdom Nanoprobes (space)
personal_traits.desc: While this trait is slotted, every 5 seconds spent in Combat will grant an increasing amount of Kinetic Damage Resistance Rating and Critical Severity with Energy Weapons. This stacks up to 10 times. All stacks are lost when you exit combat.

personal_traits.name: Limited Telepathy
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves your ability to see stealthed foes and increases the duration of Expose.  Some attacks can Expose a target for a short duration.  An Exposed target will take bonus damage if hit with an Exploit attack.  This trait will increase how long a target will be Exposed.  This trait also allows you to better perceive foes in your peripheral vision, protecting you from flanking attacks at a wider angle than those without Limited Telepathy.
personal_traits.availability: Joined Trill, Rigelian, Romulan, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Living Hull
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. A working knowledge of Undine biotechnology has allowed you to line crucial portions of your ship's hull with bioengineered bacteria that can actively rebuild damaged portions of the ship. This regeneration remains active while in combat, but is far more effective outside of combat.

personal_traits.name: Lobes
personal_traits.desc:
Ground Trait. Makes it significantly easier to detect stealthed opponents and increases your exploit damage by 10%. Some attacks can perform an Exploit for bonus damage if the target is Exposed. This trait increased the damage of a successful Exploit.

Also provides a 20% discount in all store prices for items sold for energy credits or gold-pressed latinum.

personal_traits.name: Logical
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of psionic attacks as well as confuses and placate.

personal_traits.name: Lower Decks Experience
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Grants a massive bonus to the damage of Bridge Officers after they use Ensign-rank Bridge Officer Abilities. 30 second recharge.

personal_traits.name: Lucky
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases critical hit chance and expose chance.  Does not stack with other expose chance buffs.  Some attacks can Expose a target for a short duration.  An Exposed target will take bonus damage if hit with an Exploit attack.  This trait increases the chance your attacks will Expose an enemy target.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Jem'Hadar Vanguard, Klingon, Lethean, Nausicaan, Orion, Rigelian, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill

personal_traits.name: Magnified Armaments
personal_traits.desc: +All Damage

personal_traits.name: Magnified Firepower
personal_traits.desc: All Weapon Damage

personal_traits.name: Make it Go
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. By using... methodology... derived from Pakled heapships, the Captain's starship is modified in many unorthodox ways, resulting in unpredictable beneficial effects. The wisdom of such strategies is left to the individual Captain to evaluate. The first benefit conveyed is always Damage Resistance Rating, but it becomes unpredictable after 30 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Medical Nanite Cloud
personal_traits.desc: AoE Heal and Rezz

personal_traits.name: Medical Nanites
personal_traits.desc: Health Regeneration

personal_traits.name: Medical Vanguard
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. This trait enhances all of your Buffs and Heals to harden their target's shields, preventing any damage from bleeding through the shields and hitting the target.  They also provide a moderate shield heal to the target, ensuring that their hardened shields can adequately protect them.

personal_traits.name: Meditative Calm
personal_traits.desc: +15% increased chance to Expose

personal_traits.name: Menacing
personal_traits.desc: The chance for Threatening Stance to gain stacks is doubled and double the stacks can be gained per second.

personal_traits.name: Mental Acuity
personal_traits.desc: Increases your Damage while Aiming in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Mental Conditioning
personal_traits.desc: Increases your resistance to control effects and improves your Psionic Damage Resistance in ground combat.

personal_traits.name: Mental Discipline
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to the effects of psionic attacks as well as confuse and placate.  Confuse can cause you to accidentally attack an ally, while placate can prevent you from seeing a foe that placated you.  This trait reduces the duration of those effects.

personal_traits.name: Mind Drain
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Channels your psychic power into your target's mind, draining him and transferring that energy to heal your wounds.  This ability only works on targets that are alive and will not work on mechanical or otherwise artificial targets.  This attack bypasses your target's shields.

personal_traits.name: Mind Meld
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Mind Meld applies a short duration stun and a longer duration confuse to the target. Mind Meld is difficult to resist. This ability only works on targets that are alive and will not work on mechanical or otherwise artificial targets. This ability can Expose the target, so the target will take bonus damage if hit with an Exploit Attack.  You must be in close range to your target to perform a Mind Meld.

personal_traits.name: Miniaturized Chrono-Capacitor
personal_traits.desc: Reduces Kit Module Recharge Times

personal_traits.name: Molecular Defense Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases Resistance against Phaser, Disruptor and Plasma based attacks.

personal_traits.name: Molt
personal_traits.desc: Auto Heal after Damage Taken

personal_traits.name: Momentum
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. When in combat, your ability to outmaneuver enemy vessels will gradually improve, represented by an increase in flight speed and turn rate. This bonus will be lost when combat ends.

personal_traits.name: Munitions Dampeners
personal_traits.desc: Physical and Kinetic Damage Resistance

personal_traits.name: Nadion Bypass
personal_traits.desc: You bypass some of the safety restrictions from performing a Nadion Inversion, increasing the damage output of energy weapons for a short time.

personal_traits.name: Nanite Repair Matrix
personal_traits.desc: Trigger a hull heal when your ship's hull drops below 50 percent strength. May active[sic] once every 90 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Nanomolecular Architect
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. This trait enhances all of your Turrets, Mortars, Drones, and other fabrications to have increased Resistance to all damage and increased Regeneration.

personal_traits.name: Nanoprobe Contagion
personal_traits.desc: Your nanoprobe infestations are especially virulent, allowing for smaller doses to infest targets. Your Nanoprobe Infestation's recharge time is reduced if the initial target dies while it is still active.

personal_traits.name: Nanoprobe Feedback
personal_traits.desc: Grants a chance to reflect Directed Energy Damage when hit in space combat. Reflected Damage is Doubled vs. Undine. This chance is doubled versus Undine. This effect cannot be triggered more than once every 10 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Nanoprobe Field Generator
personal_traits.desc: Grants a chance to increase Shield Hardness by a small amount when hit in space combat. This chance is doubled versus Undine. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

personal_traits.name: Natural Armor
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to physical and energy damage.

personal_traits.name: Natural Immunities
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate damage resistance to radiation and toxic damage.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Liberated Borg, Pakled, Reman, Talaxian

personal_traits.name: Nerve Pinch
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Precise pinch on the target's neck. Prevents the target from taking action for the duration. This ability only works on targets that are alive and will not work on mechanical or otherwise artificial targets. This ability can Expose the target, so the target will take bonus damage if hit with an Exploit Attack. You must be in close range to your target to perform a Nerve Pinch.

personal_traits.name: Neural Blast
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Inject the target with neural toxins, which reduces the target's movement speed with a chance to stun the target. This ability can Expose the target.

personal_traits.name: Neural Network Overload
personal_traits.desc: Chance to deal Electrical Damage and Reduce Run Speed

personal_traits.name: Neutral Zone
personal_traits.desc:
Your starship is especially resilient against attacks made by foes that you have not yet attacked, or not attacked recently.
  • +30 All Damage Resistance Rating vs foes you have not attacked in the past 30 sec.

personal_traits.name: Oblique Shielding
personal_traits.desc:
You gain increased Damage Resistance based on the percentage left of your combined shield facings.

Based on percent of shield remaining:
+40-0 All Damage Resistance Rating

(Decreases as Shields Decrease)

personal_traits.name: Omega Graviton Amplifier
personal_traits.desc: Chance to Deal Shield-Penetrating Kinetic Damage

personal_traits.name: Omega Graviton Pulse Module
personal_traits.desc: Borg Adapt Slower + Chance to Deal Kinetic Damage

personal_traits.name: Omega Kinetic Shearing
personal_traits.desc: Kinetic Torpedoes and Mines deal an additional 10% of the damage they deal before resistances are calculated, as a shield-penetrating DoT over 6 a second period.

personal_traits.name: Omega Weapon Proficiency
personal_traits.desc: Increases Energy and Melee Damage

personal_traits.name: One Little Ship
personal_traits.desc: Helpful Danube Runabout

personal_traits.name: Operative
personal_traits.desc: Increases Critical Chance and Critical Severity.

personal_traits.name: Orbital Devastation
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. You have mastered coordination between ground and space targeting parameters allows you to utilize adaptive targeting algorithms when striking from orbit. Your ability to provide extremely precise ground-to-ship coordination allows your Orbital Strike to be upgraded into an Orbital Chasing Beam that will seek out foes after striking.

personal_traits.name: Pack Leader
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Your Hunting acumen allows you and your allied teammates to more regularly gain the advantage over foes. This translates to an increased likelihood of landing Expose effects, and the duration of those effects.

personal_traits.name: Particle Defense Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases Resistance against Tetryon, Polaron and Antiproton based attacks.

personal_traits.name: Particle Generator Amplifier
personal_traits.desc: Bonus Exotic Damage

personal_traits.name: Particle Manipulator
personal_traits.desc: Improved Criticals for Exotic Damage, based on Particle Generators

personal_traits.name: Pattern Recognition
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: The longer you remain in combat, the more you are capable of defending yourself from attacks. Every several seconds, your defenses and shield hardness will increase up to a maximum of 4 stacks. All stacks of this buff will be lost when you leave combat.

personal_traits.name: Peak Health
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves maximum health and adds resistance to toxic damage.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Penetrating Rounds
personal_traits.desc: Armor Penetration

personal_traits.name: Personal Energy Amplifier
personal_traits.desc: Bonus Kit Damage

personal_traits.name: Photonic Armor Protocol
personal_traits.desc: On incoming Critical hits, gain +425.5 Temporary hit Points for 15 seconds (Can trigger once every 60 sec)

personal_traits.name: Photonic Capacitor
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. This trait causes the activation of your Science abilities to reduce your remaining cooldown on Photonic Fleet by 20 seconds.  This effect may only be triggered a maximum of once every 10 seconds, and will only trigger if Photonic Fleet is currently in cooldown.

personal_traits.name: Photonic Field Protocol
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: A backup defensive algorithm activates when your ship is struck by Critical hits, giving you a large amount of Temporary Hit Points.  May occur once every 60 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Photonic Reinforcement
personal_traits.desc: As an expert in Photonic Studies, your Photonic Fleet ability summons an additional ship.

personal_traits.name: Physical Conditioning
personal_traits.desc: Increases ground runspeed

personal_traits.name: Physical Strength
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves the physical damage of melee attacks, and gives all melee attacks a chance to knock down your target.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Caitian, Ferasan, Klingon, Liberated Borg, Pakled, Reman, Saurian, Jem'Hadar, Jem'Hadar Vanguard

personal_traits.name: Piezo-Electric Discharge
personal_traits.desc: Chance for AOE Shield Drain

personal_traits.name: Piezo-Electric Perimeter Snare
personal_traits.desc: AoE Electrical Damage and DoT,Root and Runspeed Debuff

personal_traits.name: Piezo-Electric Weapon Amplification
personal_traits.desc: Chance for AOE Shield Drain

personal_traits.name: Pig-Headed
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves resistance against placate and hold. If you are critically hit you have a chance to become enraged and deal more damage.

personal_traits.name: Pike Maneuver
personal_traits.desc: When deploying mine'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000000-QINU`"'sic'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000001-QINU`"', Pike Maneuver grants a damage buff to mines and bestows a short burst of speed and maneuvering to escape out of range.

personal_traits.name: Pirate
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves all damage dealt and increases your perception of stealthed enemies.

personal_traits.name: Pistol Training
personal_traits.desc: Increases Damage from Pistols

personal_traits.name: Plasma Weapon Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases damage with Plasma Energy Weapons.

personal_traits.name: Point Blank Shot
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Increases Energy Weapon Damage the closer you are to the target.

personal_traits.name: Positive Feedback Loop
personal_traits.desc: Activating any Exotic Damage ability grants you a 10% increase to Hull and Shield Healing effectiveness. Activating any Hull or Shield Heal grants you a 10% Bonus to Exotic Damage. Each effect is mutually exclusive.

personal_traits.name: Pounce
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Pounce launches you across the gap to your target, dealing melee damage with a chance to knock down. This attack can Exploit the target.

personal_traits.name: Precision
personal_traits.desc: Increases your Critical Hit Chance in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Predatory Instincts
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait.

personal_traits.name: Privateer's Luck
personal_traits.desc: When you take damage while your shields are below 10% capacity, gain bonus Dodge and Immunity to Control Debuffs for a short duration.

personal_traits.name: Projectile Training
personal_traits.desc: Increases Projectile Weapon Damage.

personal_traits.name: Quantum Singularity Manipulation
personal_traits.desc: Drastically increases all space Science Stats for a short time. After a few seconds, your ship will also be cloaked for the remaining duration of the power. You may fire your weapons and use abilities normally without breaking the cloak. This cloak does not bring your shields offline.

personal_traits.name: Radiant Detonation Matrix
personal_traits.desc: Chance to inflict AoE Damage and Remove Buffs

personal_traits.name: Radiant Detonation Module
personal_traits.desc: Chance to Inflict AoE Damage and Remove Buffs

personal_traits.name: Rapid Support
personal_traits.desc: Your Career-specific Fleet ability has a reduced Recharge Time. This applies to Engineering Fleet, Tactical Fleet, and Science Fleet.

personal_traits.name: Rapture
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Deals psionic damage over time with a chance to stun the target. Psionic damage completely bypasses shields and the Stun cannot be resisted. This ability only works on targets that are alive and will not work on mechanical or otherwise artificial targets. This attack can Exploit targets.

personal_traits.name: Reactive Healing Accelerator
personal_traits.desc: On Crit triggers self Heal

personal_traits.name: Reactive Protomatter Infusion
personal_traits.desc: Gain Health and Shield Regeneration when Critically Hit

personal_traits.name: Reactive Shielding
personal_traits.desc: Trigger shield heal when Critically hit.

personal_traits.name: Reactive Ship Repairs
personal_traits.desc: Self Heal on Critical Hit

personal_traits.name: Reconstructive Radiation
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: After receiving Radiation Damage,you heal overtime and remove all debuffs.

personal_traits.name: Redirected Armor Plating
personal_traits.desc: Res after being shot from behind or sides

personal_traits.name: Redundant Antimatter Containment
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves Damage Resistance Rating based on Engine power (Maximum +25 at 125 Engine Power)

personal_traits.name: Refracting Tetryon Cascade
personal_traits.desc:
Releases a cascading burst of Tetryon energy from your Deflector Dish at foes within 3km. The Tetryon Cascade will refract from initial targets to other nearby targets, dealing less damage with each jump. The Refracting Tetryon Cascade can jump to 2 additional targets. The charge can only jump 5km to the next target.
WARNING: If the target's sensors are scrambled or otherwise confused when it is hit with the Tetryon Cascade, the charge may bounce back to you or your allies.

personal_traits.name: Regenerative Control Synergy
personal_traits.desc: Personal Space trait: +Regen from activating control bridge officer abilities.

personal_traits.name: Regenerative Shield Augmentation
personal_traits.desc: Continuous Shield Regeneration

personal_traits.name: Regenerative Torpedo Synergy
personal_traits.desc: Using a Shield Healing Bridge Officer ability reduces Torpedo Bridge Officer recharge times.

personal_traits.name: Rending Shots
personal_traits.desc: Firing ground weapons increases Crit Chance

personal_traits.name: Repair Crews
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: While in combat, you gain a stacking bonus to All Damage Resistance and Regeneration

personal_traits.name: Reprisal
personal_traits.desc: When Controlled, gain Crit Severity

personal_traits.name: Reptilian Strength
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves the damage of melee attacks and the severity of your knockback attacks.

personal_traits.name: Resilient
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to physical and energy damage.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Human, Joined Trill, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Restorative Control Synergy
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: +Regen from activating control kit module.

personal_traits.name: Rifle Training
personal_traits.desc: Increases Damage from Rifles

personal_traits.name: Rogue Scientist Aboard
personal_traits.desc: Randomly triggers one of the following abilities every 60 sec.

personal_traits.name: Rogue's Charm
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Chance to Placate Enemy when Struck

personal_traits.name: Rolling Tide
personal_traits.desc: Player Takedown Heal/Speed Buff

personal_traits.name: Romulan Operative
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Increases critical hit chance and critical hit severity.  Decreases the cooldown of cloaking abilities.

personal_traits.name: S.W.A.T. System
personal_traits.desc: Enemy ships of Cruiser rank and smaller which attack your ship in the rear arc are pulled through subspace to the front of your ship, and are severely slowed for 8 seconds. 20 second cooldown.

personal_traits.name: Salvage Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. When attacking heavily-damaged starships, you have a chance of salvaging the debris caused by continued attacks. This debris can be used to create new items and components through the use of the R&D System.

personal_traits.name: Saru's Grace
personal_traits.desc: Controlling Enemies Stacks Dmg and Speed Buff

personal_traits.name: Saru's Vigor
personal_traits.desc: Controlling Enemies Stacks Dmg and Speed Buff

personal_traits.name: Savior
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. The longer you remain in combat, the more effective you are at healing yourself and allies. Every several seconds, your healing effectiveness will increase. You will also gain an increasing portion of any outgoing heals you perform applied back to yourself as a self-heal. All stacks of this buff will be lost when you leave Combat.

personal_traits.name: Secret Command Codes
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: You gain a bonus to Control and Damage Resistance and a Heal over Time effect for ten seconds when you are the target of a Control effect. May occur once every 30 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Security Detail
personal_traits.desc: Your Security Escorts are now trained in the use of grenades.

personal_traits.name: Seduce
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Confuse the target and trick them to attack their allies. This ability only works on targets that are alive and will not work on mechanical or otherwise artificial targets. This ability can Expose the target.

personal_traits.name: Seductive
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Makes you more resistant to the effects of confuse and placate while reducing your threat generation in combat.

personal_traits.name: Self-Modulating Fire
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: You gain a Shield Penetration buff for your weapons when landing a critical hit on your target. May occur once every 45 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Self-Modulating Shots
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: You gain a Shield Penetration buff for your ranged weaponry when landing a critical hit on your target. May occur once every 45 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Sensor Targeting Assault
personal_traits.desc: You will render your target's weapons offline when you land a critical hit in space combat, as long as this effect is active. A successful critical hit will consume this effect temporarily, which will refresh 20 seconds later.

personal_traits.name: Shadow of the Black Mountain
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Grants a bonus to members of your away team who have not yet been knocked unconscious on this excursion. If you yourself are knocked unconscious, the bonus is removed from them all. Multiple instances of this trait do not stack with each other.

personal_traits.name: Shield Frequency Analyst
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Improves outgoing Shield Healing powers.

personal_traits.name: Shield Harmonic Resonance
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. When you are hit by an energy weapon, your shields generate additional Resistance to that type of energy.  This Resistance stacks up to three times.  Only one type of Energy Resistance can be active at any given time from this trait.

personal_traits.name: Shield Technician
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases your Maximum Shield Hit Points.

personal_traits.name: Shroud
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Stealth and Single Attack Damage Buff

personal_traits.name: Singularity Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. All of your attacks gain a chance to build 1 Singularity Level.  This chance is increased the lower your current Singularity Level.  This proc can only occur once every 20 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Situational Awareness
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. This trait causes all of your Grenade powers to expose their targets for up to 7 seconds.

personal_traits.name: Slippery Target (Lukari Reputation)
personal_traits.desc: Control Immunity

personal_traits.name: Smuggler's Luck
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: When a Shield Facing is depleted, Increased Defense and Gain Immunity to Control Debuffs for a short duration.

personal_traits.name: Soldier
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases the damage and critical hit damage of your ranged weapons.  All attacks have a chance to do bonus damage.  This is called a Critical Hit.  This trait increases the damage done when you successfully land a Critical Hit.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Bajoran, Gorn, Human, Nausicaan, Pakled, Reman, Romulan, Saurian, Tellarite

personal_traits.name: Space Explorer is a Great Gig
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Grants a bonus to Kit Performance based on Kit Readiness, and also grants a small bonus to Kit Readiness.

personal_traits.name: Spirit Walk
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Temporarily increases your damage resistance and provides a surge of healing.

personal_traits.name: Spiritual
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Decreases the length of time between each pulse of health regeneration and also increases the effectiveness of healing abilities used on you.

personal_traits.name: Spring in Your Step
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: Movement Speed Enhanced by Control Abilities

personal_traits.name: Strength of Body
personal_traits.desc: +Kperf from Captain Abilities

personal_traits.name: Strength of Mind
personal_traits.desc: +Willpower

personal_traits.name: Strengthened Personal Shielding
personal_traits.desc: +Shield Resistance

personal_traits.name: Strengthened Shielding
personal_traits.desc: Shield Resistance

personal_traits.name: Strike Team Specialist
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. When attacking target, you have a chance to increase your Critical Hit chance for 15 seconds.  This can stack up to three times.

personal_traits.name: Stubborn
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves resistance against holds, stuns, slows, and placate effects.  A Hold or Stun can stop you from moving or acting.  A Slow can reduce your movement speed.  Placate can prevent you from seeing a target that placated you.  This trait reduces the duration of these effects.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Sturdy
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Provides innate resistance to physical damage and knockback attacks.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Gorn, Klingon, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Rigelian, Saurian, Talaxian, Trill

personal_traits.name: Subnucleonic Transferal
personal_traits.desc: Your advanced understanding of nucleonic physics allows for Subnucleonic beam to drain a portion of your targets power levels, increasing your own in the process.

personal_traits.name: Superior Shield Repair
personal_traits.desc: Ship Shield Regeneration

personal_traits.name: Supersaturated Katra Stones
personal_traits.desc:
Ground Trait. Chance when Damaged to target the attacker with an Area of Effect Psionic attack. Each attacker can only be targeted once per 30 seconds.

Vulcan Katra Stones act similarly to control rods in a primitive fission reactor, albeit with psionic energy instead of stray neutrons. When reinforced with a structural integrity field, these stones can handle far more stress than normal. The slightest disturbance from a hostile mind releases this stored energy violently, achieving a rather sudden and unpleasant psionic energy equilibrium with the supersaturated stone.

personal_traits.name: Sure Footed
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves resistance against abilities that knock you back or root you in place.  This trait reduces the chance a knock will affect you, and it will reduce the duration of a root.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Symbiotic Ice
personal_traits.desc: 6% of Beam Weapon Damage as Cold Damage.

personal_traits.name: Tactical Advantage
personal_traits.desc: Your selected target receives a damage resistance debuff to your attacks based on its current health. This debuff increases as your selected target's health decreases. This debuff effect activates when the selected target's health is at 50% or less in space combat.

personal_traits.name: Tactical Precision
personal_traits.desc: Grants a minor Accuracy bonus when a Tactical Bridge Officer Ability is used in space combat. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

personal_traits.name: Taking You With Me
personal_traits.desc: Short Duration Rez on Death

personal_traits.name: Teamwork
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves the exploit damage done by you and your allies.  Some attacks can perform an Exploit for bonus damage if the target is Exposed.  This trait increases the damage done by a successful Exploit.

personal_traits.name: Techie
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves your Hull Repair skill, which increases the effectiveness of abilities that heal or regenerate your ships hull.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Reman, Rigelian, Saurian, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Technophile
personal_traits.desc: Using a kit module gives +Kit Performance

personal_traits.name: Telekinetic
personal_traits.desc: Activatable Ground Trait. Activating this ability knocks the target back with telekinetic force.  This ability can Expose the target.

personal_traits.name: Telepathic
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Improves your ability to see stealthed foes and increases the duration of Expose.  Some attacks can Expose a target for a short duration.  An Exposed target will take bonus damage if hit with an Exploit attack.  This trait will increase how long a target will be Exposed.

personal_traits.name: Temporal Agent
personal_traits.desc: Team Earns Dilithium Ore on Kill

personal_traits.name: Temporal Flux Conditioning
personal_traits.desc: Damage Over Time and Hazard Resistance

personal_traits.name: Temporal Flux Dissipators
personal_traits.desc: Damage Over Time and Hazard Resistance

personal_traits.name: Tenavik's Counsel
personal_traits.desc:
Ground Trait. Triggers off of Weapons or Exothermic Induction Field.


Tenavik, the Klingon monk who facilitated Captain Pike's acquisition of a time crystal, kept more than just the stones. While anecdotal rather than scientific, Pike's report of the things Tenavik showed him have born strange fruit, some of which have already been recreated in the lab.

personal_traits.name: Terran Targeting Systems
personal_traits.desc: Crit Severity, being critically hit slows you.

personal_traits.name: Tethered Non-Baryonic Asteroid
personal_traits.desc: Activating this trait will deploy an asteroid with unusual gravitational properties behind your ship, tethered by tractor beams. It follows behind your ship, pulling in all nearby enemies and dealing damage over time to them.

personal_traits.name: The Boimler Effect
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Provides a chance for using Bridge Officer Abilities to recharge all other Bridge Officer Ability recharge times up to their respective Shared Cooldown Categories.

personal_traits.name: The Old Razzle-Dazzle
personal_traits.desc:
Space Trait: You gain random amounts of power to all systems for a short while, after you are critically hit in space combat.

"How are we doing on that old razzle-dazzle?"
-Dal R'El"

When under pressure, your crew comes up with unorthodox methods to temporarily boost system effectiveness.

personal_traits.name: Thrill-seeker
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait: Increases your Flight Speed and Full Impulse Flight Speed.

personal_traits.name: Torpedo Astrometric Synergy
personal_traits.desc: Using a Torpedo Bridge Officer ability reduces Science Bridge Officer recharge times.

personal_traits.name: Torpedo Pre-Fire Sequence
personal_traits.desc: Torpedo Damage and Destructible Torpedo Flight Speed

personal_traits.name: Tricorder Analysis
personal_traits.desc: Tricorder Scan pinpoints critical locations within the physiology of your targets, allowing you to cause more damage with critical hits for a short time.

personal_traits.name: Tyler's Duality
personal_traits.desc: Critical Chance based on Hull Capacity

personal_traits.name: Tyler's Memories
personal_traits.desc: Close Range Damage Increase

personal_traits.name: Undeniable
personal_traits.desc: Armor Penetration Buff

personal_traits.name: Unshaken Resolve
personal_traits.desc: Armor Penetration Buff

personal_traits.name: Unstoppable
personal_traits.desc: Player Takedown Heal/Speed Buff

personal_traits.name: Unyielding Ideals
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. You and your target gain a Temporary Health Shield and Increased Damage when using a revive ability, such as CPR. Also applies to self-revive abilities.

personal_traits.name: Up Close and Personal
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Increases ranged weapon damage the closer you are to the target.

personal_traits.name: Upgraded Gear
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Grant a bonus to Kit Performance for each Foe you personally defeat. The bonus lasts until leaving the map or being defeated.</br></br>Contact with the 32nd Century, while highly illegal, is sometimes unavoidable. Technology left behind after contact tends to be incredibly valuable, but there is often a great deal of difficult work required to actually make use of it outside the ecosystem of technology inside its proper time.

personal_traits.name: Vanquish
personal_traits.desc: You gain Armor Penetration against your targets based on their current health percent.

personal_traits.name: Varuvian Explosives
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Dealing Kinetic Weapon damage has a percent chance to deal additional Radiation Damage. This extra damage is not improved by sources of increased or bonus damage a second time, except by increases or bonuses specific to Radiation Damage.

personal_traits.name: Velocity Attenuators
personal_traits.desc: Physical and Kinetic Damage Resistance

personal_traits.name: Vicious
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait: The longer you remain in combat, the more you are capable of effectively inflicting damage to your foes. Every several seconds, your damage output and critical severity will increase up to a maximum of 5 stacks. All stacks of this buff will be lost when you leave Combat.

personal_traits.name: Viral Engine Overload
personal_traits.desc: Target's Engines offline on critical Hit

personal_traits.name: Viral Weapon Overload
personal_traits.desc: Target's Weapons Offline on Critical Hit

personal_traits.name: Visual Dampening Field
personal_traits.desc: PBAoE Cloak to Allies, Confuse to Foes

personal_traits.name: Volatile Defenses
personal_traits.desc: Radiation AoE triggered by short-range attack

personal_traits.name: Volatile Plating
personal_traits.desc: When damaged by a projectile weapon, you will respond by issuing a burst of radiation out from your starship that will damage all foes within a short distance.

personal_traits.name: Warp Theorist
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Improves your Warp Core Potential skill, which increases all power levels of your ship. Also improves Electro-Plasma Systems, which improve power transfer and regeneration rates aboard your ship.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Rigelian, Romulan, Talaxian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Warrior
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. An upgrade to Soldier, this trait increases ranged weapon damage, physical melee damage and crit damage.

personal_traits.name: Watch Your Back
personal_traits.desc: +Res after being shot from behind or sides

personal_traits.name: Well Travelled
personal_traits.desc: Space Trait. Your familiarity with all reaches of the known galaxy means you're always first on the scene when requested by your fleet or your homeworld. Your pursuit of speed in touring the galaxy has familiarized you with exactly how far you can push your ship, allowing you to use Transwarp more often than most.
personal_traits.availability: Alien, Andorian, Bajoran, Benzite, Betazoid, Bolian, Caitian, Ferasan, Ferengi, Gorn, Human, Joined Trill, Klingon, Lethean, Liberated Borg, Nausicaan, Orion, Pakled, Reman, Rigelian, Romulan, Saurian, Tellarite, Trill, Vulcan

personal_traits.name: Whole Lotta X's
personal_traits.desc:
Space Trait: When your Hull is low, your ship will receive a Hull and Shield Heal.

"...that's a whole lotta X's.
-Dal R'El"

You and your crew's quick thinking allow you avoid disaster (some of the time).'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000000-QINU`"'sic'"`UNIQ--nowiki-00000001-QINU`"'

personal_traits.name: Wing Commander
personal_traits.desc: 100% Rank Up XP for all Hangar Pets

personal_traits.name: Zhat Vash Venom
personal_traits.desc: Ground Trait. Close-range attacks will occasionally trigger a spray of toxic damage in a short-ranged cone. Additionally, after being defeated in battle you will spray the  area around your body with additional toxic damage.
